Standards Library

OWASP Top 10

The OWASP Top 10 is a standard awareness document for developers and web application security. It represents a broad consensus about the most critical security risks to web applications.

2021

NIST SSDF

The NIST Secure Software Development Framework (SSDF) is a set of fundamental, sound, and secure software development practices based on established secure software development practice documents from organizations such as BSA, OWASP, and SAFECode.

SP 800-218 v1.1

SOC 2

SOC 2 is a compliance framework developed by the AICPA for service organizations, based on five Trust Services Criteria: Security, Availability, Processing Integrity, Confidentiality, and Privacy.

2017 Trust Services Criteria

OWASP ASVS

The OWASP Application Security Verification Standard (ASVS) provides a basis for testing web application technical security controls and provides developers with a list of requirements for secure development.

v4.0

SDLC Compliance Auditor v0.1.0
